nimbodata.core.cloud module¶

nimbodata.core.rest_server module¶

Module implements a dynamic REST API for Nimbodata using Flask.

nimbodata.core.rest_server.apiresponder()[source]¶

Handle get select.

Handle get select.

Handle post select.

Remnants.

nimbodata.core.rest_server.respond(path)[source]¶

Generic path responder, on its way out.

nimbodata.core.rest_server.responder(method, rfunc, objid=None)[source]¶

Handle I/O and Error translation between API and REST.
